attributes.action: Allow Strip clubs on the Isle of Man
attributes.additional_details: Strip clubs can be a wholesome source of income for people, and a source of entertainment for stressed workers on a Friday evening.
attributes.background: We, the humans of the Isle of Man, would like the same opportunity as a crown dependency opportunity to frequent strip clubs on the Isle of Man the same as our UK counterparts.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Licencing is a matter for the Government and courts of the Isle of Man.
